synopsis.text: This thrilling anime follows the escapades of Lupin the Third, a notorious criminal known for his audacious heist attempts around the globe. Accompanied by his trusted allies – the skilled marksman Jigen, the stoic samurai Goemon, and the cunning Fujiko – Lupin sets his sights on the world's most valuable treasures, from Al Capone's hidden fortune to the elusive Angel Collection. But as they dive into the depths of the Bermuda Triangle and traverse the landscapes of China, the relentless Inspector Zenigata remains hot on their trail, determined to bring Lupin to justice once and for all. With every new adventure, Lupin and his gang must stay one step ahead of their pursuer and navigate the challenges that stand between them and their coveted prizes.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
